content: data that includes power monitoring information, power consumption, and the air input temperature for the server. An example of the Monitors Dashboard task is shown in Figure . Figure 11-11 Monitors Dashboard task Chapter 11. Environmental requirements 471 Environmental Efficiency Statistics task The Environmental Efficiency Statistics task (see Figure 11-12) is part of the Monitor task group. It provides historical power consumption and thermal information for the CPC. The data is presented in table format and graphical “histogram” format. The data also can be exported to a .csv-formatted file so that the data can be imported into a spreadsheet. For this task, you must use a web browser to connect to an HMC. Figure 11-12 Environmental Efficiency Statistics task 472 IBM z16 (3931) Technical Guide © Copyright IBM Corp. 2022. All rights reserved. 473 Chapter 12.
